snippet: Germany's energy exchange, part of Deutsche Boerse AG, has agreed to buy all the shares in U.S. peer Nodal to pursue its global growth strategy, Deutsche Boerse said on Friday....

headline.main: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism
headline.print_headline: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism

lead_paragraph: Germany's energy exchange, part of Deutsche Boerse AG, has agreed to buy all the shares in U.S. peer Nodal to pursue its global growth strategy, Deutsche Boerse said on Friday.
